author: henning
msg: don't copy only project.xml, copy all files from the common directory
as they might potentially be needed for building.

author: tfischer
msg: ok, the dependency is not tricky any more, but maven still needs to have
the extended project.xml in the source distribution in order to be able
to run maven jar in the source distribution

author: wsmoak
msg: Fix invalid xml, change to version 1.4 of the taglib plugin.

Thanks to Maven Taglib Plugin author Fabrizio Giustina for fixing a problem with the tagreference pages (markup from CDATA sections was displaying on the page) and releasing a new version of the plugin.
This is an empty revision for padding.
